description: Number of dissections of a polygon.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: F. Harary, E. M. Palmer and R. C. Read, On the cell-growth problem for arbitrary polygons, Discr. Math. 11 (1975), 371-389.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 11 2016
